Grand Finale.NAME: Grand Finale
Grand Finale.DESCRIPTION: Só pode ser jogada se não houver cartas na sua pilha de compra. NL Cause !D! de dano a TODOS os inimigos.
Grand Finale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Minha pilha de compra NL precisa estar #rVazia.

Immolate.NAME: Imolar
Immolate.DESCRIPTION: Cause !D! de dano a TODOS inimigos. NL Adicione uma Queimadura a sua pilha de descartes.

Regret.NAME: Arrependimento
Regret.DESCRIPTION: Injogável. NL No fim do seu turno, perca 1 PV para cada carta em sua mão.

Crippling Poison.NAME: Nuvem Debilitante
Crippling Poison.DESCRIPTION: Aplique !M! de Veneno e 2 de Fraqueza a TODOS os inimigos. NL Exaurir.

A Thousand Cuts.NAME: Mil Cortes
A Thousand Cuts.DESCRIPTION: Sempre que você jogar uma carta, cause !M! de dano a TODOS os inimigos.

Spot Weakness.NAME: Encontrar Fraqueza
Spot Weakness.DESCRIPTION: Se um inimigo tem a intenção de atacar, ganhe !M! de Força.

Dark Shackles.NAME: Grilhões Sombrios
Dark Shackles.DESCRIPTION: O inimigo perde !M! de Força pelo resto deste turno. NL Exaurir.

Glass Knife.NAME: Faca Vítrea
Glass Knife.DESCRIPTION: Cause !D! de dano duas vezes. O dano da Faca Vítrea é reduzido em 2 neste combate.

Cloak And Dagger.NAME: Manto E Adaga
Cloak And Dagger.DESCRIPTION: Ganhe !B! de Proteção. NL Adicione !M! Estoque à sua mão.
Cloak And Dagger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ganhe !B! de Proteção. NL Adicione !M! Estoques à sua mão.

Underhanded Strike.NAME: Golpe Furtivo
Underhanded Strike.DESCRIPTION: Cause !D! de dano. NL Se você descartou uma carta neste turo, ganhe [G] [G].

Anger.NAME: Ira
Anger.DESCRIPTION: Cause !D! de dano. NL Adicione uma cópia desta carta a sua pilha de descarte.

Storm of Steel.DESCRIPTION: Descarte sua mão. NL Adicione 1 Estoque à sua mão para cada carta descartada.
Storm of Steel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Descarte sua mão. NL Adicione 1 Estoque aprimorado à sua mão para cada carta descartada.

Cleave.NAME: Fender
Cleave.DESCRIPTION: Cause !D! de dano a TODOS os inimigos.

Wraith Form v2.NAME: Forma Espectral
Wraith Form v2.DESCRIPTION: Ganhe !M! de Intangibilidade. NL No fim do seu turno, perca 1 Destreza.

Sadistic Nature.NAME: Natureza Sádica

J.A.X..NAME: B.O.M.B.A.
J.A.X..DESCRIPTION: Perca 3 PV. NL Ganhe !M! de Força . NL Exaurir.

Offering.NAME: Oferenda

Exhume.NAME: Exumar

Power Through.NAME: Resistir

Dual Wield.NAME: Manejar Duplo

Dual Wield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Crie duas cópias de uma carta de Ataque ou Poder na sua mão.

Leg Sweep.NAME: Rasteira

Flex.NAME: Flexionar

Dagger Spray.NAME: Borrifar Adagas
Dagger Spray.DESCRIPTION: Cause !D! de dano a TODOS os inimigos duas vezes.

Bullet Time.NAME: Câmera Lenta

Catalyst.NAME: Catalisador

Catalyst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triplique o Veneno de um inimigo. NL Exaurir.

Reaper.NAME: Ceifeiro
Reaper.DESCRIPTION: Cause !D! de dano a TODOS inimigos. Cure-se o tanto de dano não protegido. NL Exaurir.

Tactician.DESCRIPTION: Injogável. NL Se esta carta for descartada de sua mão, ganhe [G].

Iron Wave.DESCRIPTION: Ganhe !B! de Proteção. NL Cause !D! de dano.

Hemokinesis.DESCRIPTION: Perca !M! PV. NL Cause !D! de dano.

Intimidate.NAME: Intimidar

Necronomicurse.DESCRIPTION: Injogável. NL Não há como fugir desta Maldição.

Choke.NAME: Estrangular
Choke.DESCRIPTION: Cause !D! de dano. NL Sempre que você jogar uma carta neste turno, o inimigo alvo perde !M! PV.

Poisoned Stab.DESCRIPTION: Cause !D! de dano. NL Aplique !M! de Veneno.

True Grit.DESCRIPTION: Ganhe !B! de Proteção. NL Exaura uma carta aleatória da sua mão.

Shrug It Off.DESCRIPTION: Ganhe !B! de Proteção. NL Compre 1 carta.

Endless Agony.NAME: Agonia Sem Fim
Endless Agony.DESCRIPTION: Ao comprar esta carta, adicione uma cópia dela à sua mão. NL Cause !D! de dano. NL Exaurir.

Pummel.NAME: Esmurrar

Metallicize.DESCRIPTION: No fim do seu turno, ganhe !M! de Proteção.

Combust.DESCRIPTION: No fim do seu turno, perca 1 PV e cause !M! de dano a TODOS os inimigos.

Doubt.DESCRIPTION: Injogável. NL No fim do seu turno, ganhe 1 de Fraqueza.

Dark Embrace.DESCRIPTION: Sempre que uma carta for exaurida, NL compre 1 carta.

Noxious Fumes.DESCRIPTION: No início do seu turno, aplique !M! de Veneno a TODOS os inimigos.

Infinite Blades.DESCRIPTION: No início do seu turno, adicione um Estoque à sua mão.

Double Tap.NAME: Tiro Duplo
Double Tap.DESCRIPTION: Neste turno, seu próximo Ataque será jogado duas vezes.
Double Tap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Neste turno, seus próximos !M! Ataques serão jogados duas vezes.

Thinking Ahead.NAME: Pensar à Frente
Thinking Ahead.DESCRIPTION: Compre 2 cartas. NL Coloque uma carta da sua mão no topo da sua pilha de compra. NL Exaurir.
Thinking Ahead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Compre 2 cartas. NL Coloque uma carta da sua mão no topo da sua pilha de compra.

Distraction.NAME: Distração
Distraction.DESCRIPTION: Adicione uma Técnica aleatória à sua mão. NL Ela custa 0 neste turno. NL Exaurir.

Dodge and Roll.NAME: Esquivar e Rolar
Dodge and Roll.DESCRIPTION: Ganhe !B! de Proteção. NL No próximo turno, ganhe !B! de Proteção.

All Out Attack.NAME: Ataque Total
All Out Attack.DESCRIPTION: Cause !D! de dano a TODOS os inimigos. NL Descarte 1 carta aleatoriamente.

Flying Knee.NAME: Joelhada Voadora
Flying Knee.DESCRIPTION: Cause !D! de dano. NL Ganhe [G] no próximo turno.

Predator.NAME: Predador
Predator.DESCRIPTION: Cause !D! de dano. NL Compre 2 cartas a mais no próximo turno.

Madness.NAME: Loucura
Madness.DESCRIPTION: Uma carta aleatória na sua mão custa 0 pelo resto do combate. NL Exaurir.

Expertise.NAME: Perícia
Expertise.DESCRIPTION: Compre cartas até que você tenha !M! na mão.

Auto Shields.NAME: Auto-Shields
Auto Shields.DESCRIPTION: If you have 0 Block, gain !B! Block.

Fission.NAME: Fission
Fission.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all of your Orbs. Increase your max Orb count by the number of Orbs Evoked.

Storm.NAME: Storm
Storm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power, Channel 1 Lightning.
Storm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a Power, Channel 1 Lightning.

Impulse.NAME: Impulse
Impulse.DESCRIPTION: Use the passive effect of all of your Channeled Orbs. NL Exhaust.
Impulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Use the passive effect of all of your Channeled Orbs.

Go for the Eyes.NAME: Go for the Eyes
Go for the Eyes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak.

Flux Capacitor.NAME: Flux Capacitor
Flux Capacitor.DESCRIPTION: Replace all Channeled Orbs with Plasma.

Self Repair.NAME: Self Repair
Self Repair.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, heal !M! HP.

Overclock.NAME: Overclock
Overclock.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Upgrade a random Orb.

Hyperbeam.NAME: Hyperbeam
Hyperbeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Lose !M! Focus.

Energy Pulse.NAME: Energy Pulse
Energy Pulse.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your Energy.
Energy Pulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to twice your Energy.

Heatsinks.NAME: Heatsinks
Heatsinks.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power card, draw !M! card.
Heatsinks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power card, draw !M! cards.

Darkness.NAME: Darkness
Darkness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Channel !M! Dark.

Magnetism.NAME: Magnetism
Magnetism.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a random colorless card to your hand.

Recycle.NAME: Recycle
Recycle.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain [B] equal to its cost.

Melter.NAME: Melter
Melter.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from an enemy. NL Deal !D! damage.

FTL.NAME: FTL
FTL.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have played less than !M! cards this turn, draw 1 card.

Barrage.NAME: Barrage
Barrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Channeled Orb.

Allocate.NAME: Allocate
Allocate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL Lose 1 Strength. NL Lose 1 Dexterity.

Creative AI.NAME: Creative AI
Creative AI.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a random Power card to your hand.

Genetic Algorithm.NAME: Genetic Algorithm
Genetic Algorithm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. When played, permanently increase this card's Block by !M!. Exhaust.

Amplify.NAME: Amplify
Amplify.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Power is played twice.
Amplify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Powers are played twice.

Conserve Battery.NAME: Conserve Battery
Conserve Battery.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Energy is conserved for next turn.

Aggregate.NAME: Aggregate
Aggregate.DESCRIPTION: Gain [B] for every !M! cards in your draw pile.

Buffer.NAME: Buffer
Buffer.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
Buffer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next !M! times you would lose HP.

Winter.NAME: Winter
Winter.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you have an Orb slot, Channel 1 Frost.

Steam Power.NAME: Steam Power
Steam Power.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add a Burn into your discard pile.

Reprogram.NAME: Reprogram
Reprogram.DESCRIPTION: Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. You may discard any of them.

Cache.NAME: Cache
Cache.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, choose !M! card from your draw pile and place it on top.

Rebound.NAME: Rebound
Rebound.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

Stack.NAME: Stack
Stack.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
Stack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile.

Multi-Cast.NAME: Multi-Cast
Multi-Cast.DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next Orb X times.
Multi-Cast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next Orb X+1 times.

Sweeping Beam.NAME: Sweeping Beam
Sweeping Beam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! card.

Undo.NAME: Undo
Undo.DESCRIPTION: Set your HP to what it was last turn. NL Exhaust.

Doom and Gloom.NAME: Doom and Gloom
Doom and Gloom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Channel !M! Dark.

Thunder Strike.NAME: Thunder Strike
Thunder Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Focus to a random enemy !M! times.

Machine Learning.NAME: Machine Learning
Machine Learning.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! additional card at the start of each turn.
Machine Learning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw !M! additional card at the start of each turn.

Streamline.NAME: Streamline
Streamline.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play Streamline, reduce its cost by !M! for this combat.

All For One.NAME: All For One
All For One.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Put all Cost 0 cards from your discard pile into your hand.

Channel.NAME: Channel
Channel.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power card this turn, gain !M! Block.

Gash.NAME: Gash
Gash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL All Gash cards deal !M! additional damage this combat.

Axe Kick.NAME: Axe Kick
Axe Kick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Evoke your next Orb.

Hologram.NAME: Hologram
Hologram.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return a random card from your discard pile to your hand.
Hologram.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.

Blaster.NAME: Blaster
Blaster.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain [B] for each Channeled Orb.

Biased Cognition.NAME: Biased Cognition
Biased Cognition.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL At the start of each turn, lose 1 Focus.

Static Discharge.NAME: Static Discharge
Static Discharge.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take attack damage, Channel !M! Lightning.
Static Discharge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take attack damage, Channel !M! Lightning.

Ice Wall.NAME: Ice Wall
Ice Wall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain +3 Block for each Channeled Frost.
Ice Wall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain +5 Block for each Channeled Frost.

Reboot.NAME: Reboot
Reboot.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle all of your cards into your draw pile, then draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

Blizzard.NAME: Blizzard
Blizzard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each Frost Channeled this combat.
Blizzard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal !M! times the Frost Channeled this combat to ALL enemies.

Turbo.NAME: TURBO
Turbo.DESCRIPTION: Gain [B] [B]. NL Add a Void into your discard pile.
Turbo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [B] [B] [B]. NL Add a Void into your discard pile.

Rainbow.NAME: Rainbow
Rainbow.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Lightning, 1 Frost, and 1 Dark. NL Exhaust.

Redo.NAME: Redo
Redo.DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next Orb. NL Channel the Orb that was just Evoked.

White Noise.NAME: White Noise
White Noise.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Power to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Nova.NAME: Nova
Nova.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies for each Power played this combat.
Nova.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to four times the number of Powers played this combat.

Sunder.NAME: Sunder
Sunder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills the enemy, gain [B] [B] [B].

Chill.NAME: Chill
Chill.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Frost for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust.
Chill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Channel !M! Frost per enemy. NL Exhaust.

Seek.NAME: Seek
Seek.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards from your draw pile and place them into your hand. NL Exhaust.
Seek.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards from your draw pile and place them into your hand. NL Exhaust.

Echo Form.NAME: Echo Form
Echo Form.DESCRIPTION: The first card you play each turn is played twice.
Echo Form.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first card you play each turn is played twice.

Force Field.NAME: Force Field
Force Field.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [B] for each Power card played this combat. NL Gain !B! Block.

Prime.NAME: Prime
Prime.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Channel an Orb, draw !M! card.

Loop.NAME: Loop
Loop.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, use the passive ability of your next Orb.
Loop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, use the passive ability of your next Orb !M! times.

Hello World.NAME: Hello World
Hello World.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Common card into your hand.
Hello World.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a random Common card into your hand.

Primitive Tech.NAME: Primitive Tech
Primitive Tech.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card of Common rarity, draw !M! card.

Scrape.NAME: Scrape
Scrape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard any non-cost 0 cards drawn this way.

Reprieve.NAME: Reprieve
Reprieve.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy does not intend to attack, gain !M! Focus.

Lockon.NAME: Lock-On
Lockon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This turn, Lightning and Dark Orbs target this enemy.

Consume.NAME: Consume
Consume.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL Lose 1 Orb Slot.

BootSequence.NAME: Boot Sequence
BootSequence.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Innate. NL Exhaust.

Steam.NAME: Steam
Steam.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Steam's Block is lowered by 2 this combat.

Electrodynamics.NAME: Electrodynamics
Electrodynamics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lightning now hits ALL enemies. NL If there is only 1 enemy, Lightning strikes twice.

Core Surge.NAME: Core Surge
Core Surge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

Compile Driver.NAME: Compile Driver
Compile Driver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card for each unique Orb you have.
